summary:
The Rothschilds are a rich and powerful Jewish family known for their banking business. They originated in Frankfurt, Germany, in the 1500s, and became famous under Mayer Amschel Rothschild in the 1700s. He had five sons who started banks in different European cities, making the family very wealthy and influential.

The Rothschilds were nobles in the Holy Roman Empire and the United Kingdom. In the 1800s, they had the biggest private fortune globally. Over time, their wealth decreased, but they still have successful businesses in various industries. Their old country homes can be found across Europe. Unfortunately, the family has also been the target of many false conspiracy theories.
title: Rothschild family
